thread.title: Rob and Khloe Kardashian's exes Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom both attend Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards
thread.title_full: Rob and Khloe Kardashian's exes Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom both attend Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Rob and Khloe Kardashian's exes Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom both attend Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards
text:
Rob and Khloe Kardashian's exes Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom both attend Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards The pair posed for snaps on the orange carpet in Los Angeles on Saturday Share A case of the Kardashian ex! (Photo: FilmMagic/Getty) Share Get celebs   Could   
Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom both attended the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards on Saturday. 
Rob and Khloe Kardashian's exes posed separately on the orange carpet at the Galen Centre in Los Angeles ahead of the annual bash. 
Mum-of-two Blac, who recently split from Rob, brought along adorable son King Cairo to the annual event. 
Standing on the orange carpet, Blac kept things simple but sexy in a pair of ripped jeans and a white shirt that was unbuttoned just below the cleavage. 
She teamed the laid back look with yellow ankle boots and wore her hair in tight waves. Blac kept things simple but sexy (Photo: Getty Images North America) Khloe's ex made a rare public appearance (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) 
It's unclear if she bumped into Khloe's ex Lamar who was also pictured on the orange carpet in a rare public outing. 
The former NBA star, dressed in black tracksuit bottoms and a matching jacket, looked happy and healthy as he smiled for cameras. Read More Demi Lovato, Heidi Klum, Zendaya and Gwen Stefani lead the glitz and glamour at Nickelodeon KCAs 
Elsewhere on the carpet, Demi Lovato stunned in a striking coral coloured dress, which featured cut out panels on either side and a small split down one leg. 
The bronzed Cool For The Summer beauty, who was later slimed, looked radiant with simple make-up and popping red lips. (Photo: Rex Features) (Photo: Rex Features) (Photo: WireImage) 
The Voice judge Gwen Stefani also made her mark in a kooky black shirt that was adorned with colourful patches. 
She teamed the shirt with tiny metallic shorts, fishnet tights and black over the knee boots. 
While Heidi Klum, who never takes a red carpet lightly, went all out in a colour block cut-out frock with sexy thigh split. 
Actress Zendaya was also in attendance and looked all kinds of glamorous in a slinky burnt orange dress and black boots.
